titleStmt.title: Account of Contributions for the Feast of Sarapis
titleStmt.author: Unknown

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Allocation of contributions of calves and young pigs furnished for the feast of Sarapis. As follows:;of Aphrodites polis and Arabon, [1] calf, 2 young pigs;;of Arsinoe and Tanis, [1] calf, 2 young pigs;;of Alabanthis and Ptolemais Hormou, [1] calf, 2 young pigs;;of Bakchias and Hephaistias, [1 calf], 2 young pigs;;of Boubastos and Kerkesoucha, [1] calf, 2 young pigs;;of Dinnis and [- - -: 1 calf], 2 young pigs;;of Hiera and Mendes, [1] calf, 2 young pigs;;of Nestou and Philadelphia, [1 calf], 2 young pigs;;of Neilou polis and Psenyris, [1] calf, 2 young pigs;;of Stratonos and Sebennytos, [1 calf], 2 young pigs

listBibl.bibl: Hagedorn U - Hagedorn D - Youtie LC - Youtie HC, PPetaus, 40, 1969, Pl. XII -- BL VIII, 277 (bibliography)
